description:
"Where are you from? You have an interesting accent."
"I'm from Australia," Caleb answered.
"Sweet! You were telling me you had moved around a lot though."
"Yeah, I'm kind of a traveller. I don't like to stay in one place too long."
"What are some of your favorite places?"
"New Zealand!"
"Why New Zealand?"
"Just because it's so small, but it's so diverse, even though it's that small. The mountains, the lakes, especially the snow... 'cause I love snowboarding!"
Caleb was very sharing for being such a soft-spoken guy. Once he opened up, though, he was pretty funny. After an hour or so, he was doing cartwheels and handstands!
He's got a really nice build, and he's pale, with a dusting of hair on his chest. Big nipples and solid legs too. He was a little bashful when I commented that his cock had a slight curve to it.
"Wow! You came everywhere!" I remarked after he blew his load.
" Yeah, I know... I just get turned on so much by the cameras. I didn't think I would!" he said. "I just can't help myself!"
title: Caleb
